alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 3:19PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 345 PM MST... At 319 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Olberg, or 8 miles northwest of Casa Grande, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Blackwater, Olberg, Sacaton and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 176 and 190. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 139 and 155. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
